scripts.client:create:tutorialDb: docker run --rm --link clickhouse-server1:clickhouse-server yandex/clickhouse-client --host clickhouse-server  --query "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS tutorial"
scripts.client:create:tables: docker run --rm --link clickhouse-server1:clickhouse-server yandex/clickhouse-client --host clickhouse-server  --query "$(cat clickhouse-backup/createHitsTables.sql)" && docker run --rm --link clickhouse-server1:clickhouse-server yandex/clickhouse-client --host clickhouse-server  --query "$(cat clickhouse-backup/createVisitsTables.sql)"
scripts.client:delete:tables: docker run --rm --link clickhouse-server1:clickhouse-server yandex/clickhouse-client --host clickhouse-server  --query 'Drop table IF EXISTS tutorial.hits_v1;' && docker run --rm --link clickhouse-server1:clickhouse-server yandex/clickhouse-client --host clickhouse-server  --query 'Drop table IF EXISTS tutorial.visists_v1;'
scripts.client:loadMetricaTables: npm run client:create:tutorialDb && npm run client:delete:tables && npm run client:create:tables && npm client:loadMetricaData
scripts.data:download:ontime: rm -rf download/ontime.tar && wget https://clickhouse-datasets.s3.yandex.net/ontime/partitions/ontime.tar && mv ontime.tar download
scripts.data:load:visits: cat $PWD/download/visits_v1.tsv | docker run -i --rm --link clickhouse-server1:clickhouse-server yandex/clickhouse-client -m --host clickhouse-server  --query "INSERT INTO tutorial.visits_v1 FORMAT TSV" --max_insert_block_size=100000
scripts.data:load:hits: cat $PWD/download/hits_v1.tsv | docker run -i --rm --link clickhouse-server1:clickhouse-server yandex/clickhouse-client -m --host clickhouse-server  --query "INSERT INTO tutorial.hits_v1 FORMAT TSV" --max_insert_block_size=100000
scripts.backup:create:server1: docker run --rm --name clickhouse-create-backup1 --network host -v $PWD/clickhouse_db_vol1:/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost -e CLICKHOUSE_PORT=9000 -p 8123:8123 -p 9000:9000 alexakulov/clickhouse-backup create "my_backup_$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H-%M-%S)"
scripts.backup:clean:server1: docker run --rm --name clickhouse-create-backup1 --network host -v $PWD/clickhouse_db_vol1:/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost -e CLICKHOUSE_PORT=9000 -p 8123:8123 -p 9000:9000 alexakulov/clickhouse-backup clean
scripts.backup:ls:server1: docker run --rm --network host -v $PWD/clickhouse_db_vol1:/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost -e CLICKHOUSE_PORT=9000 -p 8123:8123 -p 9000:9000 alexakulov/clickhouse-backup list
scripts.backup:restore:server2: docker run --rm --name clickhouse-restore-backup2 --network host -v $PWD/clickhouse_db_vol2:/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost -e CLICKHOUSE_PORT=9001 -p 8124:8123 -p 9001:9000 alexakulov/clickhouse-backup restore "my_backup"
